subject: Baseball
Hispanic-Americans
Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Gómez, a native of Cuba, became the first full-time major league manager from Latin America when he managed the San Diego Padres in 1969.
snippet: Gómez, a native of Cuba, became the first full-time major league manager from Latin America when he managed the San Diego Padres in 1969.
